   20: 
   21: -module(error_SUITE).
   22: -export([suite/0,all/0,groups/0,
   23: 	 already_defined/1,
   24:          bad_config_exclusive/1,bad_config_selective/1,
   25:          bitstrings/1,
   26: 	 classes/1,constraints/1,constructed/1,enumerated/1,
   27: 	 imports_exports/1,instance_of/1,integers/1,objects/1,
   28: 	 object_field_extraction/1,oids/1,rel_oids/1,
   29: 	 object_sets/1,parameterization/1,
   30: 	 syntax/1,table_constraints/1,tags/1,values/1]).
   31: 
   32: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   33: 
   34: suite() -> [{ct_hooks, [ts_install_cth]}].
   35: 
   36: all() ->
   37:     [{group,p}].
   38: 
   39: groups() ->
   40:     [{p,parallel(),
   41:       [already_defined,
   42:        bitstrings,
   43:        bad_config_exclusive,
   44:        bad_config_selective,
   45:        classes,
   46:        constraints,
   47:        constructed,
   48:        enumerated,
   49:        imports_exports,
   50:        instance_of,
   51:        integers,
   52:        objects,
   53:        object_field_extraction,
   54:        object_sets,
   55:        oids,
   56:        rel_oids,
   57:        parameterization,
   58:        syntax,
   59:        table_constraints,
   60:        tags,
   61:        values]}].
   62: 
   63: parallel() ->
   64:     case erlang:system_info(schedulers) > 1 of
   65:         true  -> [parallel];
   66:         false -> []
   67:     end.
   68: 
   69: already_defined(Config) ->
   70:     M = 'Already',
   71:     P = {M,
   72: 	 <<"Already DEFINITIONS ::= BEGIN\n"
   73: 	   "  I ::= INTEGER\n"
   74: 	   "  i I ::= 42\n"
   75: 	   "  I ::= OCTET STRING\n"
   76: 	   "  I ::= CLASS { &Type }\n"
   77: 	   "  MYCLASS ::= CLASS { &Type }\n"
   78: 	   "  i MYCLASS ::= { &Type INTEGER }\n"
   79: 	   "  o MYCLASS ::= { &Type INTEGER }\n"
   80: 	   "  I MYCLASS ::= { o }\n"
   81: 	   "  I{T} ::= SEQUENCE OF T\n"
   82: 	   "  I{INTEGER:x} INTEGER ::= { 1 | 2 | x }\n"
   83: 	   "  i{T} MYCLASS ::= { &Type T }\n"
   84: 	   "END\n">>},
   85:     {error,
   86:      [
   87:       {structured_error,{M,4},asn1ct_check,{already_defined,'I',2}},
   88:       {structured_error,{M,5},asn1ct_check,{already_defined,'I',2}},
   89:       {structured_error,{M,7},asn1ct_check,{already_defined,'i',3}},
   90:       {structured_error,{M,9},asn1ct_check,{already_defined,'I',2}},
   91:       {structured_error,{M,10},asn1ct_check,{already_defined,'I',2}},
   92:       {structured_error,{M,11},asn1ct_check,{already_defined,'I',2}},
   93:       {structured_error,{M,12},asn1ct_check,{already_defined,'i',3}}
   94:      ]
   95:     } = run(P, Config),
   96:     ok.
   97: 
   98: bad_config_exclusive(Config) ->
   99:     M = 'BadConfigExclusive',
  100:     P = {M,
  101:          <<"BadConfigExclusive DEFINITIONS AUTOMATIC TAGS ::= BEGIN
  102:               Seq ::= SEQUENCE {
  103:                     a INTEGER,
  104:                     b SEQUENCE OF INTEGER,
  105:                     c BOOLEAN
  106:               }
  107:             END\n">>},
  108: 
  109:     Conf1 = [{exclusive_decode,{'WrongModuleName',[whatever]}}],
  110:     {error,{bad_module_name,'WrongModuleName',M}} = run(P, Config, Conf1),
  111: 
  112:     Conf2 = [{exclusive_decode,wrong}],
  113:     {error,{bad_exclusive_decode,wrong}} = run(P, Config, Conf2),
  114: 
  115:     Conf3 = [{exclusive_decode,{M,[wrong]}}],
  116:     {error,{bad_exclusive_decode,[wrong]}} = run(P, Config, Conf3),
  117: 
  118:     Conf4 = [{exclusive_decode,{M,{42,[top_type,[]]}}}],
  119:     {error,{bad_exclusive_decode,_}} = run(P, Config, Conf4),
  120: 
  121:     Conf5 = [{exclusive_decode,
  122:               {M, [{exclusive_Seq, ['TopType', [{b,parts}]]}]}}],
  123:     {error,{undefined_type,'TopType'}} = run(P, Config, Conf5),
  124: 
  125:     Conf6 = [{exclusive_decode,
  126:               {M, [{exclusive_Seq, ['Seq', [{d,parts}]]}]}}],
  127:     {error,{undefined_name,d}} = run(P, Config, Conf6),
  128: 
  129:     Conf7 = [{exclusive_decode,
  130:               {M, [{exclusive_Seq, ['Seq', [{b,whatever}]]}]}}],
  131:     {error,{bad_decode_instruction,{b,whatever}}} = run(P, Config, Conf7),
  132: 
  133:     Conf8 = [{exclusive_decode,
  134:               {M, [{exclusive_Seq, ['Seq', [{a,b,c}]]}]}}],
  135:     {error,{bad_decode_instruction,{a,b,c}}} = run(P, Config, Conf8),
  136: 
  137:     ok.
  138: 
  139: bad_config_selective(Config) ->
  140:     M = 'BadConfigSelective',
  141:     P = {M,
  142:          <<"BadConfigSelective DEFINITIONS AUTOMATIC TAGS ::= BEGIN
  143:               Seq ::= SEQUENCE {
  144:                     a INTEGER,
  145:                     b SEQUENCE OF INTEGER,
  146:                     c BOOLEAN,
  147:                     cc CHOICE {
  148:                        ca INTEGER,
  149:                        cb BOOLEAN
  150:                     }
  151:               }
  152:             END\n">>},
  153: 
  154:     Conf1 = [{selective_decode,{'WrongModuleName',[whatever]}}],
  155:     {error,{bad_module_name,'WrongModuleName',M}} = run(P, Config, Conf1),
  156: 
  157:     Conf2 = [{selective_decode,wrong}],
  158:     {error,{bad_selective_decode,wrong}} = run(P, Config, Conf2),
  159: 
  160:     Conf3 = [{selective_decode,{M,[wrong]}}],
  161:     {error,{bad_selective_decode,wrong}} = run(P, Config, Conf3),
  162: 
  163:     Conf4 = [{selective_decode,{M,[{f,not_list}]}}],
  164:     {error,{bad_selective_decode_type_list,not_list}} = run(P, Config, Conf4),
  165: 
  166:     Conf5 = [{selective_decode,{M,{42,[top_type,[]]}}}],
  167:     {error,{bad_selective_decode,{42,_}}} = run(P, Config, Conf5),
  168: 
  169:     Conf6 = [{selective_decode,
  170:               {M, [{only_Seq_b, ['TopType', [{b,parts}]]}]}}],
  171:     {error,{undefined_type,'TopType'}} = run(P, Config, Conf6),
  172: 
  173:     Conf7 = [{selective_decode,
  174:               {M, [{only_Seq_b, ['Seq', d]}]}}],
  175:     {error,{undefined_name,d}} = run(P, Config, Conf7),
  176: 
  177:     Conf8 = [{selective_decode,
  178:               {M, [{only_Seq_b, ['Seq', b, whatever]}]}}],
  179:     {error,{bad_selective_decode_element,whatever}} = run(P, Config, Conf8),
  180: 
  181:     Conf9 = [{selective_decode,
  182:               {M, [{only_Seq_something, ['Seq', cc, whatever]}]}}],
  183:     {error,{undefined_name,whatever}} = run(P, Config, Conf9),
  184: 
  185:     Conf10 = [{selective_decode,
  186:                {M, [{only_Seq_something, ['Seq', a, x]}]}}],
  187:     {error,{stepping_into_primitive,[a,x]}} = run(P, Config, Conf10),
  188: 
  189:     ok.
  190: 
  191: bitstrings(Config) ->
  192:     M = 'Bitstrings',
  193:     P = {M,
  194: 	 <<"Bitstrings DEFINITIONS AUTOMATIC TAGS ::= BEGIN\n"
  195: 	   "  Bs1 ::= BIT STRING {a(1), a(1)}\n"
  196: 	   "  Bs2 ::= BIT STRING {a(1), b(2), a(3)}\n"
  197: 	   "  Bs3 ::= BIT STRING {x(1), y(1)}\n"
  198: 	   "  Bs4 ::= BIT STRING {x(-1), y(0)}\n"
  199: 	   "END\n">>},
  200:     {error,
  201:      [{structured_error,{M,2},asn1ct_check,{namelist_redefinition,a}},
  202:       {structured_error,{M,3},asn1ct_check,{namelist_redefinition,a}},
  203:       {structured_error,{M,4},asn1ct_check,{value_reused,1}},
  204:       {structured_error,{M,5},asn1ct_check,{invalid_bit_number,-1}}
  205:      ]} = run(P, Config),
  206:     ok.
  207: 
  208: classes(Config) ->
  209:     M = 'Classes',
  210:     P = {M,
  211: 	 <<"Classes DEFINITIONS AUTOMATIC TAGS ::= BEGIN\n"
  212: 	   "  LowerCase ::= CLASS { &id INTEGER UNIQUE }\n"
  213: 	   "  CL ::= CLASS { &id INTEGER UNIQUE DEFAULT 42}\n"
  214: 	   "END\n">>},
  215:     {error,
  216:      [{structured_error,{M,2},asn1ct_check,
  217:        {illegal_class_name,'LowerCase'}},
  218:       {structured_error,{M,3},asn1ct_check,
  219:        {unique_and_default,id}}
  220:      ]} = run(P, Config),
  221:     ok.
  222: 
  223: constraints(Config) ->
  224:     M = 'Constraints',
  225:     P = {M,
  226: 	 <<"Constraints DEFINITIONS AUTOMATIC TAGS ::= BEGIN\n"
  227: 	   "  II-1 ::= INTEGER (holder-1.&obj)\n"
  228: 	   "  II-2 ::= INTEGER ('1234'H<..20)\n"
  229: 	   "  II-3 ::= INTEGER (1..<\"abc\")\n"
  230: 	   "  II-4 ::= INTEGER (10..1)\n"
  231: 
  232: 	   "  HOLDER ::= CLASS {\n"
  233: 	   "    &obj HOLDER OPTIONAL\n"
  234: 	   "  }\n"
  235: 
  236: 	   "  holder-1 HOLDER ::= { &obj holder-2 }\n"
  237: 	   "  holder-2 HOLDER ::= { }\n"
  238: 	   "END\n">>},
  239:     {error,
  240:      [
  241:       {structured_error,{M,2},asn1ct_check,illegal_value},
  242:       {structured_error,{M,3},asn1ct_check,illegal_integer_value},
  243:       {structured_error,{M,4},asn1ct_check,illegal_integer_value},
  244:       {structured_error,{M,5},asn1ct_check,reversed_range}
  245:      ]} = run(P, Config),
  246:     ok.
  247: 
  248: enumerated(Config) ->
  249:     M = 'Enumerated',
  250:     P = {M,
  251: 	 <<"Enumerated DEFINITIONS AUTOMATIC TAGS ::= BEGIN\n"
  252: 	   "  Enum ::= ENUMERATED { a, b, c }\n"
  253: 	   "  e Enum ::= d\n"
  254: 	   "  EnumExt ::= ENUMERATED { x, ..., y }\n"
  255: 	   "  ext EnumExt ::= z\n"
  256: 	   "  S1 ::= SEQUENCE {\n"
  257:            "    ge1 Enum DEFAULT a,\n"
  258:            "    ge2 EnumExt DEFAULT x,\n"
  259:            "    ge3 EnumExt DEFAULT y,\n"
  260: 	   "    e Enum DEFAULT aa\n"
  261:            "  }\n"
  262: 	   "  S2 ::= SEQUENCE {\n"
  263: 	   "    e2 EnumExt DEFAULT xyz\n"
  264: 	   "  }\n"
  265: 
  266: 	   "  BadEnum1 ::= ENUMERATED {a, b, c, b }\n"
  267: 	   "  BadEnum2 ::= ENUMERATED {a(1), b(2), b(3) }\n"
  268: 	   "  BadEnum3 ::= ENUMERATED {a(1), b(1) }\n"
  269: 	   "  BadEnum4 ::= ENUMERATED {a, b, ..., c(0) }\n"
  270: 	   "  BadEnum5 ::= ENUMERATED {a, b, ..., c(10), d(5) }\n"
  271: 	   "END\n">>},
  272:     {error,
  273:      [
  274:       {structured_error,{M,3},asn1ct_check,{undefined,d}},
  275:       {structured_error,{M,5},asn1ct_check,{undefined,z}},
  276:       {structured_error,{M,6},asn1ct_check,{undefined,aa}},
  277:       {structured_error,{M,12},asn1ct_check,{undefined,xyz}},
  278:       {structured_error,{M,15},asn1ct_check,
  279:        {enum_illegal_redefinition,b}},
  280:       {structured_error,{M,16},asn1ct_check,
  281:        {enum_illegal_redefinition,b}},
  282:       {structured_error,{M,17},asn1ct_check,
  283:        {enum_reused_value,b,1}},
  284:       {structured_error,{M,18},asn1ct_check,
  285:        {enum_reused_value,c,0}},
  286:       {structured_error,{M,19},asn1ct_check,
  287:        {enum_not_ascending,d,5,10}}
  288:      ]
  289:     } = run(P, Config),
  290:     ok.
  291: 
  292: imports_exports(Config) ->
  293:     Ext = 'ExternalModule',
  294:     ExtP = {Ext,
  295: 	    <<"ExternalModule DEFINITIONS AUTOMATIC TAGS ::= BEGIN\n"
  296: 	      "IMPORTS\n"
  297: 	      " Int, NonExistingImport FROM ImportsFrom;\n"
  298: 
  299: 	      " Existing ::= INTEGER\n"
  300: 	      "END\n">>},
  301:     {error,
  302:      [{structured_error,
  303:        {Ext,3},
  304:        asn1ct_check,
  305:        {undefined_import,'NonExistingImport',
  306: 	'ImportsFrom'}}]} = run(ExtP, Config),
  307: 
  308:     M = 'Imports',
  309:     P = {M,
  310: 	 <<"Imports DEFINITIONS AUTOMATIC TAGS ::= BEGIN\n"
  311: 	   "EXPORTS\n"
  312: 	   " T, UndefinedType;\n"
  313: 
  314: 	   "IMPORTS\n"
  315: 	   " NotDefined, Existing, Int, NonExistingImport\n"
  316: 	   "   FROM ExternalModule\n"
  317: 	   " X FROM UndefinedModule objid\n"
  318: 	   " Y, Z FROM UndefinedModule2;\n"
  319: 
  320: 	   "objid OBJECT IDENTIFIER ::= {joint-iso-ccitt(2) remote-operations(4)\n"
  321: 	   "    notation(0)}\n"
  322: 	   "T ::= INTEGER\n"
  323: 	   "END\n">>},
  324:     {error,[{structured_error,{M,3},asn1ct_check,
  325: 	     {undefined_export, 'UndefinedType'}},
  326: 	    {structured_error,{M,5},asn1ct_check,
  327: 	     {undefined_import,'NonExistingImport',Ext}},
  328: 	    {structured_error,{M,5},asn1ct_check,
  329: 	     {undefined_import,'NotDefined',Ext}},
  330: 	    {structured_error,{M,7},asn1ct_check,
  331: 	     {undefined_import,'X','UndefinedModule'}},
  332: 	    {structured_error,{M,8},asn1ct_check,
  333: 	     {undefined_import,'Y','UndefinedModule2'}},
  334: 	    {structured_error,{M,8},asn1ct_check,
  335: 	     {undefined_import,'Z','UndefinedModule2'}}
  336: 	   ]} = run(P, Config),
  337:     ok.
  338: 
  339: instance_of(Config) ->
  340:     M = 'InstanceOf',
  341:     P = {M,
  342: 	 <<"InstanceOf DEFINITIONS AUTOMATIC TAGS ::= BEGIN\n"
  343: 	   "XX ::= INSTANCE OF CL ({TI})\n"
  344: 	   "CL ::= CLASS {\n"
  345:            "&id INTEGER,\n"
  346:            "&Type\n"
  347: 	   "}\n"
  348: 	   "o1 CL ::= {&id 1, &Type OCTET STRING}\n"
  349: 	   "TI CL ::= { o1 }\n"
  350: 	   "END\n">>},
  351:     {error,
  352:      [{structured_error,{M,2},asn1ct_check,{illegal_instance_of,'CL'}}
  353:      ]} = run(P, Config),
  354:     ok.
  355: 
  356: integers(Config) ->
  357:     M = 'Integers',
  358:     P = {M,
  359: 	 <<"Integers DEFINITIONS AUTOMATIC TAGS ::= BEGIN\n"
  360: 	   "  Int1 ::= INTEGER {a(1), a(1)}\n"
  361: 	   "  Int2 ::= INTEGER {a(1), b(2), a(3)}\n"
  362: 	   "  Int3 ::= INTEGER {x(1), y(1)}\n"
  363: 	   "  i0 INTEGER ::= 1\n"
  364: 	   "  Int4 ::= INTEGER {x(i0), y(undef) }\n"
  365: 	   "END\n">>},
  366:     {error,
  367:      [{structured_error,{M,2},asn1ct_check,{namelist_redefinition,a}},
  368:       {structured_error,{M,3},asn1ct_check,{namelist_redefinition,a}},
  369:       {structured_error,{M,4},asn1ct_check,{value_reused,1}},
  370:       {structured_error,{M,6},asn1ct_check,{undefined,undef}}
  371:      ]} = run(P, Config),
  372:     ok.
  373: 
  374: 
  375: objects(Config) ->
  376:     M = 'Objects',
  377:     P = {M,
  378: 	 <<"Objects DEFINITIONS AUTOMATIC TAGS ::= BEGIN\n"
  379: 	   "  obj1 CL ::= { &wrong 42 }\n"
  380: 	   "  obj2 CL ::= { &wrong 1, &Wrong INTEGER }\n"
  381: 	   "  obj3 CL ::= { &Data OCTET STRING }\n"
  382: 	   "  obj4 SMALL ::= { &code 42 }\n"
  383: 	   "  InvalidSet CL ::= { obj1 }\n"
  384: 	   "  obj5 CL ::= {}\n"
  385: 	   "  ErrSet ::= PT{ {PT{inst}}}\n"
  386: 	   "  obj6 CL ::= 7\n"
  387: 	   "  obj7 CL ::= int\n"
  388: 	   "  obj8 NON-CLASS ::= { &id 1 }\n"
  389: 
  390: 	   "  CL ::= CLASS {\n"
  391: 	   "    &code INTEGER UNIQUE,\n"
  392: 	   "    &enum ENUMERATED { a, b, c},\n"
  393: 	   "    &Data,\n"
  394: 	   "    &object CL,\n"
  395: 	   "    &Set CL,\n"
  396: 	   "    &vartypevalue &Data,\n"
  397: 	   "    &VarTypeValue &Data\n"
  398: 	   "  }\n"
  399: 
  400: 	   "  SMALL ::= CLASS {\n"
  401: 	   "    &code INTEGER UNIQUE,\n"
  402:            "    &i INTEGER\n"
  403:            "  }\n"
  404: 
  405: 	   "  PT{SMALL:Small} ::= SEQUENCE { a SMALL.&code ({Small}) }\n"
  406: 	   "  inst SMALL ::= {&code 42, &i 4711}\n"
  407: 
  408: 	   "  int INTEGER ::= 42\n"
  409: 	   "  NON-CLASS ::= SEQUENCE { a BOOLEAN }\n"
  410: 	   "END\n">>},
  411:     {error,
  412:      [
  413:       {structured_error,{M,2},asn1ct_check,
  414:        {invalid_fields,[wrong],obj1}},
  415:       {structured_error,{M,3},asn1ct_check,
  416:        {invalid_fields,['Wrong',wrong],obj2}},
  417:       {structured_error,{M,4},asn1ct_check,
  418:        {missing_mandatory_fields,['Set','VarTypeValue',code,
  419: 				  enum,object,vartypevalue],obj3}},
  420:       {structured_error,{M,5},asn1ct_check,
  421:        {missing_mandatory_fields,[i],obj4}},
  422:       {structured_error,{M,6},asn1ct_check,
  423:        {invalid_fields,[wrong],'InvalidSet'}},
  424:       {structured_error,{M,7},asn1ct_check,
  425:        {missing_mandatory_fields,
  426: 	['Data','Set','VarTypeValue',code,enum,object,
  427: 	 vartypevalue],obj5}},
  428:       {structured_error,{M,8},asn1ct_check,invalid_objectset},
  429:       {structured_error,{M,9},asn1ct_check,illegal_object},
  430:       {structured_error,{M,10},asn1ct_check,illegal_object},
  431:       {structured_error,{M,11},asn1ct_check,illegal_object}
  432:      ]
  433:     } = run(P, Config),
  434:     ok.
  435: 
  436: object_field_extraction(Config) ->
  437:     M = 'ObjectFieldExtraction',
  438:     P = {M,
  439: 	 <<"ObjectFieldExtraction DEFINITIONS AUTOMATIC TAGS ::= BEGIN\n"
  440: 
  441: 	   "  DataObjSet DATA-CLASS ::= {\n"
  442: 	   "    holder-object-1.&int,\n"
  443: 	   "    ...\n"
  444: 	   "  }\n"
  445: 
  446: 	   "  DataObjSetNoExt DATA-CLASS ::= {\n"
  447: 	   "    holder-object-1.&int\n"
  448: 	   "  }\n"
  449: 
  450: 	   "  holder-object-1 HOLDER-CLASS ::= {\n"
  451: 	   "    &int 42\n"
  452: 	   "  }\n"
  453: 
  454: 	   "  HOLDER-CLASS ::= CLASS {\n"
  455:            "    &int INTEGER\n"
  456:            "  }\n"
  457: 
  458: 	   "  DATA-CLASS ::= CLASS {\n"
  459:            "    &id INTEGER\n"
  460:            "  }\n"
  461: 
  462: 	   "END\n">>},
  463:     {error,
  464:      [
  465:       {structured_error,{M,2},asn1ct_check,illegal_object},
  466:       {structured_error,{M,6},asn1ct_check,illegal_object}
  467:      ]
  468:     } = run(P, Config),
  469:     ok.
  470: 
  471: object_sets(Config) ->
  472:     M = 'ObjectSets',
  473:     P = {M, <<"ObjectSets DEFINITIONS AUTOMATIC TAGS ::= BEGIN\n"
  474: 	      "TEST-UNIQ ::= CLASS { &id INTEGER UNIQUE,  &test INTEGER }\n"
  475: 	      "UniqSet TEST-UNIQ ::= { { &id 1, &test 1 } | {&id 1, &test 2} }\n"
  476: 
  477: 	      "DOUBLE-UNIQ ::= CLASS { &id1 INTEGER UNIQUE,"
  478:               "           &id INTEGER UNIQUE }\n"
  479:               "DoubleSet DOUBLE-UNIQ ::= { {&id1 1, &id2 2} }\n"
  480: 	      "END\n">>},
  481:     {error,
  482:      [{structured_error,{M,3},asn1ct_check,{non_unique_object,1}},
  483:       {structured_error,{M,5},asn1ct_check,multiple_uniqs}
  484:      ]
  485:     } = run(P, Config),
  486:     ok.
  487: 
  488: oids(Config) ->
  489:     M = 'OIDS',
  490:     P = {M,<<"OIDS DEFINITIONS AUTOMATIC TAGS ::= BEGIN\n"
  491: 	    "CONTAINER ::= CLASS { &id OBJECT IDENTIFIER UNIQUE,\n"
  492: 	    "                      &int INTEGER OPTIONAL,\n"
  493: 	    "                      &seq SEQUENCE { a INTEGER } OPTIONAL\n"
  494: 	    "}\n"
  495: 
  496: 	    "-- This is line 6.\n"
  497: 	    "object-1 CONTAINER ::= { &id {1 2 3}, &int 42 }\n"
  498: 	    "object-2 CONTAINER ::= { &id {1 999}, &int 0 }\n"
  499: 	    "object-3 CONTAINER ::= { &id {1 2}, &seq { a 42 } }\n"
  500: 	    "oid-1 OBJECT IDENTIFIER ::= object-1.&int\n"
  501: 	    "oid-2 OBJECT IDENTIFIER ::= object-2.&id\n"
  502: 	    "oid-3 OBJECT IDENTIFIER ::= object-3.&seq\n"
  503: 	    "-- This is line 13.\n"
  504: 
  505: 	    "oid-5 OBJECT IDENTIFIER ::= { a 42, b 19 }\n"
  506: 
  507: 	    "oid-6 OBJECT IDENTIFIER ::= int\n"
  508: 	    "int INTEGER ::= 42\n"
  509: 
  510: 	    "oid-7 OBJECT IDENTIFIER ::= seq\n"
  511: 	    "seq SEQUENCE { x INTEGER } ::= { x 11 }\n"
  512: 
  513: 	    "oid-8 OBJECT IDENTIFIER ::= os\n"
  514: 	    "os OCTET STRING ::= '1234'H\n"
  515: 
  516: 	    "oid-9 OBJECT IDENTIFIER ::= { 1 os }\n"
  517: 
  518: 	    "oid-10 OBJECT IDENTIFIER ::= { 1 invalid }\n"
  519: 
  520: 	    "-- This is line 23.\n"
  521: 	    "oid-11 OBJECT IDENTIFIER ::= { 0 legal-oid }\n"
  522: 	    "legal-oid OBJECT IDENTIFIER ::= {1 2 3}\n"
  523: 
  524: 	    "bad-root-1 OBJECT IDENTIFIER ::= {99}\n"
  525: 	    "bad-root-2 OBJECT IDENTIFIER ::= {0 42}\n"
  526: 
  527: 	    "oid-object-ref-1 OBJECT IDENTIFIER ::= object-1\n"
  528: 	    "oid-object-ref-2 OBJECT IDENTIFIER ::= { object-1 19 } \n"
  529: 
  530: 	    "oid-int OBJECT IDENTIFIER ::= 42\n"
  531: 	    "oid-sequence OBJECT IDENTIFIER ::= {a 42, b 35}\n"
  532: 
  533: 	     "END\n">>},
  534:     {error,
  535:      [
  536:       {structured_error,{M,8},asn1ct_check,{illegal_oid,o_id}},
  537:       {structured_error,{M,10},asn1ct_check,{illegal_oid,o_id}},
  538:       {structured_error,{M,11},asn1ct_check,{illegal_oid,o_id}},
  539:       {structured_error,{M,12},asn1ct_check,{illegal_oid,o_id}},
  540:       {structured_error,{M,14},asn1ct_check,{illegal_oid,o_id}},
  541:       {structured_error,{M,15},asn1ct_check,{illegal_oid,o_id}},
  542:       {structured_error,{M,17},asn1ct_check,{illegal_oid,o_id}},
  543:       {structured_error,{M,19},asn1ct_check,{illegal_oid,o_id}},
  544:       {structured_error,{M,21},asn1ct_check,{illegal_oid,o_id}},
  545:       {structured_error,{M,22},asn1ct_check,{illegal_oid,o_id}},
  546:       {structured_error,{M,24},asn1ct_check,{illegal_oid,o_id}},
  547:       {structured_error,{M,26},asn1ct_check,{illegal_oid,o_id}},
  548:       {structured_error,{M,27},asn1ct_check,{illegal_oid,o_id}},
  549:       {structured_error,{M,28},asn1ct_check,{illegal_oid,o_id}},
  550:       {structured_error,{M,29},asn1ct_check,{illegal_oid,o_id}},
  551:       {structured_error,{M,30},asn1ct_check,{illegal_oid,o_id}},
  552:       {structured_error,{M,31},asn1ct_check,{illegal_oid,o_id}}
  553:      ]
  554:     } = run(P, Config),
  555:     ok.
  556: 
  557: rel_oids(Config) ->
  558:     M = 'REL-OIDS',
  559:     P = {M,<<"REL-OIDS DEFINITIONS AUTOMATIC TAGS ::= BEGIN\n"
  560: 	     "legal-oid OBJECT IDENTIFIER ::= {1 2}\n"
  561: 	     "legal-roid RELATIVE-OID ::= {1 2}\n"
  562: 	     "CONTAINER ::= CLASS { &oid OBJECT IDENTIFIER OPTIONAL,\n"
  563: 	     "                      &int INTEGER OPTIONAL,\n"
  564: 	     "                      &seq SEQUENCE { a INTEGER } OPTIONAL\n"
  565: 	     "}\n"
  566: 	     "object-1 CONTAINER ::= { &oid {1 2 3},\n"
  567: 	     "                         &int 42,\n",
  568: 	     "                         &seq {a 42}\n"
  569: 	     "                       }\n"
  570: 
  571: 	     "wrong-type-rel-oid-1 RELATIVE-OID ::= legal-oid\n"
  572: 	     "wrong-type-rel-oid-2 RELATIVE-OID ::= object-1.&oid\n"
  573: 	     "wrong-type-rel-oid-3 RELATIVE-OID ::= object-1.&int\n"
  574: 	     "wrong-type-rel-oid-4 RELATIVE-OID ::= object-1.&seq\n"
  575: 	     "wrong-type-rel-oid-5 RELATIVE-OID ::= object-1.&undef\n"
  576: 
  577: 	     "oid-bad-first OBJECT IDENTIFIER ::= {legal-roid 3}\n"
  578: 	     "roid-bad-first RELATIVE-OID ::= {legal-oid 3}\n"
  579: 	     "END\n">>},
  580:     {error,
  581:      [
  582:       {structured_error,{M,12},asn1ct_check,{illegal_oid,rel_oid}},
  583:       {structured_error,{M,13},asn1ct_check,{illegal_oid,rel_oid}},
  584:       {structured_error,{M,14},asn1ct_check,{illegal_oid,rel_oid}},
  585:       {structured_error,{M,15},asn1ct_check,{illegal_oid,rel_oid}},
  586:       {structured_error,{M,16},asn1ct_check,{undefined_field,undef}},
  587:       {structured_error,{M,17},asn1ct_check,{illegal_oid,o_id}},
  588:       {structured_error,{M,18},asn1ct_check,{illegal_oid,rel_oid}}
  589:      ]
  590:     } = run(P, Config),
  591:     ok.
  592: 
  593: 
  594: parameterization(Config) ->
  595:     M = 'Parameterization',
  596:     P = {M,
  597: 	 <<"Parameterization DEFINITIONS AUTOMATIC TAGS ::= BEGIN\n"
  598: 	   "  NotUppercase{lowercase} ::= INTEGER (lowercase)\n"
  599: 
  600: 	   "  P{T1,T2} ::= SEQUENCE { a T1, b T2 }\n"
  601: 	   "  S ::= P{OCTET STRING}\n"
  602: 
  603: 	   "  Seq ::= SEQUENCE { a INTEGER }\n"
  604: 	   "  Sbad ::= Seq{INTEGER}\n"
  605: 
  606: 	   "END\n">>},
  607:     {error,
  608:      [{structured_error,{M,2},asn1ct_check,
  609:        {illegal_typereference,lowercase}},
  610:       {structured_error,{M,4},asn1ct_check,
  611:        param_wrong_number_of_arguments},
  612:       {structured_error,{M,6},asn1ct_check,
  613:        {param_bad_type, 'Seq'}}
  614:      ]
  615:     } = run(P, Config),
  616:     ok.
  617: 
  618: 
  619: constructed(Config) ->
  620:     M = 'Const',
  621:     P = {M,
  622: 	 <<"Const DEFINITIONS AUTOMATIC TAGS ::= BEGIN\n"
  623: 	   "  Seq1 ::= SEQUENCE {a INTEGER, b BIT STRING, a BOOLEAN}\n"
  624: 	   "  Ch   ::= CHOICE {a INTEGER, b BIT STRING, a BOOLEAN}\n"
  625: 	   "  Seq2 ::= SEQUENCE {COMPONENTS OF Ch}\n"
  626: 	   "  CL   ::= CLASS { &id INTEGER UNIQUE, &Type }\n"
  627: 	   "  Seq3 ::= SEQUENCE { id CL.&id, d CL.&foo }\n"
  628: 
  629: 	   "  Seq4 ::= SEQUENCE { a INTEGER, z INTEGER OPTIONAL, b Set1 }\n"
  630: 	   "  Set1 ::= SET { c BOOLEAN, d INTEGER }\n"
  631: 	   "  s1 Seq4 ::= {a 42, b {c TRUE, zz 4711}}\n"
  632: 	   "  s2 Seq4 ::= {a 42, b {c TRUE, d FALSE}}\n"
  633: 	   "  s3 Seq4 ::= {a 42, b {c TRUE}}\n"
  634: 	   "  s4 Seq4 ::= {a 42, b {c TRUE, d 4711}, zz 4712}\n"
  635: 	   "  s5 Seq4 ::= {a 42}\n"
  636: 	   "  s6 Seq4 ::= {a 42, zz 4712, b {c TRUE, d 4711}}\n"
  637: 	   "END\n">>},
  638:     {error,
  639:      [{structured_error,{M,2},asn1ct_check,{duplicate_identifier,a}},
  640:       {structured_error,{M,3},asn1ct_check,{duplicate_identifier,a}},
  641:       {structured_error,{M,4},asn1ct_check,{illegal_COMPONENTS_OF,'Ch'}},
  642:       {structured_error,{M,6},asn1ct_check,{illegal_object_field,foo}},
  643: 
  644:       {structured_error,{M,9},asn1ct_check,{illegal_id,zz}},
  645:       {structured_error,{M,10},asn1ct_check,illegal_integer_value},
  646:       {structured_error,{M,11},asn1ct_check,{missing_id,d}},
  647:       {structured_error,{M,12},asn1ct_check,{illegal_id,zz}},
  648:       {structured_error,{M,13},asn1ct_check,{missing_id,b}},
  649:       {structured_error,{M,14},asn1ct_check,{illegal_id,zz}}
  650:      ]
  651:     } = run(P, Config),
  652:     ok.
  653: 
  654: syntax(Config) ->
  655:     M = 'Syntax',
  656:     P = {M,
  657: 	 <<"Syntax DEFINITIONS AUTOMATIC TAGS ::= BEGIN\n"
  658: 	   "  obj1  CL ::= { WRONG }\n"
  659: 	   "  obj2  CL ::= { CODE 42 AGAIN WRONG }\n"
  660: 	   "  obj3  CL ::= { INTEGER }\n"
  661: 	   "  obj4  CL ::= { BIT STRING }\n"
  662: 	   "  obj5  CL ::= { , }\n"
  663: 	   "  obj6  CL ::= { CODE , }\n"
  664: 	   "  obj7  CL ::= { CODE \"abc\" }\n"
  665: 	   "  obj8  CL ::= { CODE }\n"
  666: 	   "  obj9  CL ::= { CODE 42 ENUM}\n"
  667: 	   "  obj10 CL ::= { CODE 42 ENUM BIT STRING}\n"
  668: 
  669: 	   "  obj11 CL ::= { CODE 42 TYPE 13}\n"
  670: 	   "  obj12 CL ::= { CODE 42 TYPE d}\n"
  671: 	   "  obj13 CL ::= { CODE 42 TYPE bs-value}\n"
  672: 
  673: 	   "  bad-syntax-1 BAD-SYNTAX-1 ::= { BAD 42 }\n"
  674: 
  675: 	   "  obj14 CL ::= { CODE 42 OBJ-SET integer }\n"
  676: 	   "  obj15 CL ::= { CODE 42 OBJ-SET { A B } }\n"
  677: 	   "  obj16 CL ::= { CODE 42 OBJ-SET SEQUENCE { an INTEGER } }\n"
  678: 
  679: 	   "  obj17 CL ::= { CODE 42 OID {seqtag 42} }\n"
  680: 	   "  obj18 CL ::= { CODE 42 OID {seqtag 42, seqtag-again 43} }\n"
  681: 	   "  obj19 CL ::= { CODE 42 OID {one 1 two 2} }\n"
  682: 
  683: 	   "  BAD-SYNTAX-1 ::= CLASS {\n"
  684: 	   "    &code INTEGER UNIQUE\n"
  685: 	   "  } WITH SYNTAX {\n"
  686: 	   "    BAD &bad\n"
  687: 	   "  }\n"
  688: 
  689: 	   "  BAD-SYNTAX-2 ::= CLASS {\n"
  690: 	   "    &code INTEGER UNIQUE\n"
  691: 	   "  } WITH SYNTAX {\n"
  692: 	   "    BAD &Bad\n"
  693: 	   "  }\n"
  694: 
  695: 	   "  BAD-SYNTAX-3 ::= CLASS {\n"
  696: 	   "    &code INTEGER UNIQUE\n"
  697: 	   "  } WITH SYNTAX {\n"
  698: 	   "    [ID &code]\n"
  699: 	   "  }\n"
  700: 
  701: 	   "  BAD-SYNTAX-4 ::= CLASS {\n"
  702: 	   "    &code INTEGER UNIQUE\n"
  703: 	   "  } WITH SYNTAX {\n"
  704: 	   "    ID\n"
  705: 	   "  }\n"
  706: 
  707: 	   "  BAD-SYNTAX-5 ::= CLASS {\n"
  708: 	   "    &code INTEGER UNIQUE,\n"
  709: 	   "    &Type\n"
  710: 	   "  } WITH SYNTAX {\n"
  711: 	   "    ID\n"
  712: 	   "  }\n"
  713: 
  714: 	   "  BAD-SYNTAX-6 ::= CLASS {\n"
  715: 	   "    &code INTEGER UNIQUE\n"
  716: 	   "  } WITH SYNTAX {\n"
  717: 	   "    ID &code, &code\n"
  718: 	   "  }\n"
  719: 
  720: 	   "  BAD-SYNTAX-7 ::= CLASS {\n"
  721: 	   "    &code INTEGER UNIQUE,\n"
  722: 	   "    &Type\n"
  723: 	   "  } WITH SYNTAX {\n"
  724: 	   "    ID &Type, &code, &code, &Type\n"
  725: 	   "  }\n"
  726: 
  727: 	   "  CL ::= CLASS {\n"
  728: 	   "    &code INTEGER UNIQUE,\n"
  729: 	   "    &enum ENUMERATED { a, b, c} OPTIONAL,\n"
  730: 	   "    &Type OPTIONAL,\n"
  731: 	   "    &ObjSet CL OPTIONAL,\n"
  732: 	   "    &oid OBJECT IDENTIFIER OPTIONAL\n"
  733: 	   "  } WITH SYNTAX {\n"
  734: 	   "    CODE &code [ENUM &enum] [TYPE &Type] [OBJ-SET &ObjSet]\n"
  735:            "    [OID &oid]\n"
  736: 	   "  }\n"
  737: 
  738: 	   "  bs-value BIT STRING ::= '1011'B\n"
  739: 
  740: 	   "  integer INTEGER ::= 42\n"
  741: 	   "END\n">>},
  742:     {error,
  743:      [
  744:       {structured_error,{M,2},asn1ct_check,
  745:        {syntax_nomatch,"WRONG"}},
  746:       {structured_error,{M,3},asn1ct_check,
  747:        {syntax_nomatch,"AGAIN"}},
  748:       {structured_error,{M,4},asn1ct_check,
  749:        {syntax_nomatch,"INTEGER"}},
  750:       {structured_error,{M,5},asn1ct_check,
  751:        {syntax_nomatch,"BIT STRING"}},
  752:       {structured_error,{M,6},asn1ct_check,
  753:        {syntax_nomatch,"\",\""}},
  754:       {structured_error,{M,7},asn1ct_check,
  755:        {syntax_nomatch,"\",\""}},
  756:       {structured_error,{M,8},asn1ct_check,
  757:        {syntax_nomatch,"\"abc\""}},
  758:       {structured_error,{M,9},asn1ct_check,
  759:        syntax_nomatch},
  760:       {structured_error,{M,10},asn1ct_check,
  761:        syntax_nomatch},
  762:       {structured_error,{M,11},asn1ct_check,
  763:        {syntax_nomatch,"BIT STRING"}},
  764:       {structured_error,{M,12},asn1ct_check,
  765:        {syntax_nomatch,"13"}},
  766:       {structured_error,{M,13},asn1ct_check,
  767:        {syntax_nomatch,"d"}},
  768:       {structured_error,{M,14},asn1ct_check,
  769:        {syntax_nomatch,"bs-value"}},
  770:       {structured_error,{M,15},asn1ct_check,
  771:        {syntax_undefined_field,bad}},
  772:       {structured_error,{M,16},asn1ct_check,
  773:        {syntax_nomatch,"integer"}},
  774:       {structured_error,{M,17},asn1ct_check,
  775:        {syntax_nomatch,"\"A B\""}},
  776:       {structured_error,{M,18},asn1ct_check,
  777:        {syntax_nomatch,"SEQUENCE"}},
  778:       {structured_error,{M,19},asn1ct_check,
  779:        {syntax_nomatch,"\"seqtag 42\""}},
  780:       {structured_error,{M,20},asn1ct_check,
  781:        {syntax_nomatch,"\"seqtag 42 seqtag-again 43\""}},
  782:       {structured_error,{M,21},asn1ct_check,
  783:        {syntax_nomatch,"\"one 1 two 2\""}},
  784:       {structured_error,{M,22},asn1ct_check,
  785:        {syntax_undefined_field,bad}},
  786:       {structured_error,{M,27},asn1ct_check,
  787:        {syntax_undefined_field,'Bad'}},
  788:       {structured_error,{M,32},asn1ct_check,
  789:        {syntax_mandatory_in_optional_group,code}},
  790:       {structured_error,{M,37},asn1ct_check,
  791:        {syntax_missing_mandatory_fields,[code]}},
  792:       {structured_error,{M,42},asn1ct_check,
  793:        {syntax_missing_mandatory_fields,['Type',code]}},
  794:       {structured_error,{M,48},asn1ct_check,
  795:        {syntax_duplicated_fields,[code]}},
  796:       {structured_error,{M,53},asn1ct_check,
  797:        {syntax_duplicated_fields,['Type',code]}}
  798:      ]
  799:     } = run(P, Config),
  800:     ok.
  801: 
  802: table_constraints(Config) ->
  803:     M = 'TableConstraints',
  804:     P = {M,
  805: 	 <<"TableConstraints DEFINITIONS AUTOMATIC TAGS ::= BEGIN\n"
  806: 	   "  Seq-1 ::= SEQUENCE {\n"
  807: 	   "    contentType CONTENTS.&id,\n"
  808: 	   "    content CONTENTS.&Type({Contents}{@contentType})\n"
  809: 	   "  }\n"
  810: 
  811: 	   "  Seq-2 ::= SEQUENCE {\n"
  812: 	   "    contentType INTEGER,\n"
  813: 	   "    content CONTENTS.&Type({Contents}{@contentType})\n"
  814: 	   "  }\n"
  815: 
  816: 	   "  Int ::= INTEGER ({1})\n"
  817: 
  818: 	   "  Seq-3 ::= SEQUENCE {\n"
  819: 	   "    contentType CONTENTS.&id({1})\n"
  820: 	   "  }\n"
  821: 
  822: 	   "Contents CONTENTS ::= {\n"
  823: 	   "  {OCTET STRING IDENTIFIED BY {2 1 1}}\n"
  824: 	   "}\n"
  825: 
  826: 	   "CONTENTS ::= TYPE-IDENTIFIER\n"
  827: 	   "END\n">>},
  828:     {error,
  829:      [{structured_error,
  830:        {M,2},asn1ct_check,
  831:        {missing_table_constraint,contentType}},
  832:       {structured_error,
  833:        {M,6},asn1ct_check,
  834:        {missing_ocft,contentType}},
  835:       {structured_error,
  836:        {M,10},asn1ct_check,
  837:        illegal_table_constraint},
  838:       {structured_error,
  839:        {M,11},asn1ct_check,
  840:        invalid_table_constraint}
  841:      ]} = run(P, Config),
  842:     ok.
  843: 
  844: tags(Config) ->
  845:     M = 'Tags',
  846:     P = {M,
  847: 	 <<"Tags DEFINITIONS AUTOMATIC TAGS ::= BEGIN\n"
  848: 	   "SeqOpt1 ::= SEQUENCE\n"
  849: 	   "{\n"
  850: 	   "bool1  BOOLEAN OPTIONAL,\n"
  851: 	   "int1  INTEGER,\n"
  852: 	   "seq1  SeqIn OPTIONAL\n"
  853: 	   "}\n"
  854: 
  855: 	   "SeqOpt1Imp ::= SEQUENCE \n"
  856: 	   "{\n"
  857: 	   "bool1 [1] BOOLEAN OPTIONAL,\n"
  858: 	   "int1  INTEGER,\n"
  859: 	   "seq1  [2] SeqIn OPTIONAL,\n"
  860: 	   "seq2  [2] SeqIn OPTIONAL,\n"
  861: 	   "...,\n"
  862: 	   "int2  [3] SeqIn,\n"
  863: 	   "int3  [3] SeqIn\n"
  864: 	   "}\n"
  865: 
  866: 	   "SeqIn ::= SEQUENCE \n"
  867: 	   "{\n"
  868: 	   "boolIn  BOOLEAN,\n"
  869: 	   "intIn  INTEGER\n"
  870: 	   "}\n"
  871: 	   "\n"
  872: 
  873: 
  874: 	   "Set1 ::= SET {\n"
  875: 	   " os [0] OCTET STRING,\n"
  876: 	   " bool [0] BOOLEAN\n"
  877: 	   "}\n"
  878: 
  879: 	   "Seq1 ::= SEQUENCE {\n"
  880: 	   "a [0] IMPLICIT Choice OPTIONAL\n"
  881: 	   "}\n"
  882: 	   "Seq2 ::= SEQUENCE {\n"
  883: 	   "a [0] IMPLICIT ANY OPTIONAL\n"
  884: 	   "}\n"
  885: 	   "Choice ::=\n"
  886: 	   "CHOICE {\n"
  887: 	   "a [0] BOOLEAN,\n"
  888: 	   "b [1] INTEGER\n"
  889: 	   "}\n"
  890: 
  891: 	   "END\n">>},
  892:     {error,
  893:      [{structured_error,
  894:        {M,8},asn1ct_check,
  895:        {duplicate_tags,[seq1,seq2]}},
  896:       {structured_error,
  897:        {M,24},asn1ct_check,
  898:        {duplicate_tags,[bool,os]}},
  899:       {structured_error,
  900:        {M,28},asn1ct_check,
  901:        {implicit_tag_before,choice}},
  902:       {structured_error,
  903:        {M,31},asn1ct_check,
  904:        {implicit_tag_before,open_type}}
  905:      ]} = run(P, Config),
  906:     ok.
  907: 
  908: 
  909: values(Config) ->
  910:     M = 'Values',
  911:     P = {M,
  912: 	 <<"Values DEFINITIONS AUTOMATIC TAGS ::= BEGIN\n"
  913: 	   "  os1 OCTET STRING ::= \"abc\"\n"
  914: 	   "  os2 OCTET STRING ::= 42\n"
  915: 	   "  os3 OCTET STRING ::= { 1, 3 }\n"
  916: 	   "  os4 OCTET STRING ::= '1234'H\n"
  917: 	   "  Seq ::= SEQUENCE {\n"
  918: 	   "    an OCTET STRING\n"
  919: 	   "  }\n"
  920: 	   "  seq Seq ::= { an int }\n"
  921: 	   "  os5 OCTET STRING ::= holder-1.&str\n"
  922: 	   "  os6 OCTET STRING ::= int\n"
  923: 
  924: 	   "  int1 INTEGER ::= \"string\"\n"
  925: 	   "  int2 INTEGER ::= os4\n"
  926: 	   "  int3 INTEGER ::= not-defined\n"
  927: 	   "  int4 INTEGER ::= holder-1.&str\n"
  928: 	   "  int5 INTEGER ::= holder-2.&obj\n"
  929: 	   "  int6 INTEGER ::= holder-2.&undefined-field\n"
  930: 	   "  int7 INTEGER ::= holder-2.&UndefinedField.&id\n"
  931: 
  932: 	   "  bs1 BIT STRING ::= 42\n"
  933: 	   "  bs2 BIT STRING ::= {a,b}\n"
  934: 	   "  bs3 BIT STRING {a(0),z(25)} ::= {a,b}\n"
  935: 	   "  bs4 BIT STRING {a(0),z(25)} ::= int\n"
  936: 	   "  bs5 BIT STRING ::= holder-2.&str\n"
  937: 	   "  bs6 BIT STRING ::= holder-2.&obj\n"
  938: 
  939: 	   "  b1 BOOLEAN ::= 42\n"
  940: 	   "  b2 BOOLEAN ::= {a,b}\n"
  941: 
  942: 	   "  HOLDER ::= CLASS {\n"
  943: 	   "    &str IA5String,\n"
  944: 	   "    &obj HOLDER OPTIONAL\n"
  945: 	   "  }\n"
  946: 
  947: 	   "  holder-1 HOLDER ::= { &str \"xyz\" }\n"
  948: 	   "  holder-2 HOLDER ::= { &str \"xyz\", &obj holder-1 }\n"
  949: 
  950: 	   "  ext-1 EXTERNAL ::= {identification bad:{1 2 3}, data-value '123'H}\n"
  951: 	   "  ext-2 EXTERNAL ::= {identification syntax:{1 2 3}, data '123'H}\n"
  952: 
  953: 	   "  CH ::= CHOICE { a INTEGER, b BOOLEAN }\n"
  954: 	   "  ch1 CH ::= 2344\n"
  955: 	   "  ch2 CH ::= zz:34\n"
  956: 
  957: 	   "  st1 an < Seq ::= 42\n"
  958: 	   "  st2 zz < CH ::= 42\n"
  959: 	   "  st3 a < HOLDER ::= 42\n"
  960: 	   "  st4 a < INTEGER ::= 42\n"
  961: 
  962: 	   "  int INTEGER ::= 42\n"
  963: 	   "END\n">>},
  964:     {error,
  965:      [
  966:       {structured_error,{M,2},asn1ct_check,
  967:        illegal_octet_string_value},
  968:       {structured_error,{M,3},asn1ct_check,
  969:        illegal_octet_string_value},
  970:       {structured_error,{M,4},asn1ct_check,
  971:        illegal_octet_string_value},
  972:       {structured_error,{M,9},asn1ct_check,
  973:        illegal_octet_string_value},
  974:       {structured_error,{M,10},asn1ct_check,
  975:        illegal_octet_string_value},
  976:       {structured_error,{M,11},asn1ct_check,
  977:        illegal_octet_string_value},
  978:       {structured_error,{M,12},asn1ct_check,
  979:        illegal_integer_value},
  980:       {structured_error,{M,13},asn1ct_check,
  981:        illegal_integer_value},
  982:       {structured_error,{M,14},asn1ct_check,
  983:        illegal_integer_value},
  984:       {structured_error,{M,15},asn1ct_check,
  985:        illegal_integer_value},
  986:       {structured_error,{M,16},asn1ct_check,
  987:        illegal_integer_value},
  988:       {structured_error,{M,17},asn1ct_check,
  989:        {undefined_field,'undefined-field'}},
  990:       {structured_error,{M,18},asn1ct_check,
  991:        {undefined_field,'UndefinedField'}},
  992:       {structured_error,{M,19},asn1ct_check,
  993:        {illegal_value, "BIT STRING"}},
  994:       {structured_error,{M,20},asn1ct_check,
  995:        {illegal_value, "BIT STRING"}},
  996:       {structured_error,{M,21},asn1ct_check,
  997:        {illegal_value, "BIT STRING"}},
  998:       {structured_error,{M,22},asn1ct_check,
  999:        {illegal_value, "BIT STRING"}},
 1000:       {structured_error,{M,23},asn1ct_check,
 1001:        {illegal_value, "BIT STRING"}},
 1002:       {structured_error,{M,24},asn1ct_check,
 1003:        {illegal_value, "BIT STRING"}},
 1004:       {structured_error,{M,25},asn1ct_check,
 1005:        {illegal_value, "BOOLEAN"}},
 1006:       {structured_error,{M,26},asn1ct_check,
 1007:        {illegal_value, "BOOLEAN"}},
 1008:       {structured_error,{M,33},asn1ct_check,
 1009:        illegal_external_value},
 1010:       {structured_error,{M,34},asn1ct_check,
 1011:        illegal_external_value},
 1012:       {structured_error,{M,36},asn1ct_check,
 1013:        {illegal_id, 2344}},
 1014:       {structured_error,{M,37},asn1ct_check,
 1015:        {illegal_id, zz}},
 1016:       {structured_error,{M,38},asn1ct_check,
 1017:        {illegal_choice_type, 'Seq'}},
 1018:       {structured_error,{M,39},asn1ct_check,
 1019:        {illegal_id, zz}},
 1020:       {structured_error,{M,40},asn1ct_check,
 1021:        {illegal_choice_type, 'HOLDER'}},
 1022:       {structured_error,{M,41},asn1ct_check,
 1023:        {illegal_choice_type, 'INTEGER'}}
 1024:      ]
 1025:     } = run(P, Config),
 1026:     ok.
 1027: 
 1028: run({Mod,Spec}, Config) ->
 1029:     Base = atom_to_list(Mod) ++ ".asn1",
 1030:     File = filename:join(proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), Base),
 1031:     Include0 = filename:dirname(proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config)),
 1032:     Include = filename:join(filename:dirname(Include0), "asn1_SUITE_data"),
 1033:     ok = file:write_file(File, Spec),
 1034:     asn1ct:compile(File, [{i, Include}]).
 1035: 
 1036: run({Mod,Spec}, Config, Asn1ConfigTerm) ->
 1037:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 1038: 
 1039:     Asn1ConfigFile = filename:join(PrivDir, atom_to_list(Mod) ++ ".asn1config"),
 1040:     Asn1ConfigData = [io_lib:format("~p. \n", [Term]) || Term <- Asn1ConfigTerm],
 1041:     ok = file:write_file(Asn1ConfigFile, Asn1ConfigData),
 1042: 
 1043:     Base = atom_to_list(Mod) ++ ".asn1",
 1044:     File = filename:join(PrivDir, Base),
 1045:     ok = file:write_file(File, Spec),
 1046: 
 1047:     case asn1ct:compile(File, [{i, PrivDir}, asn1config]) of
 1048:         {error,[{structured_error,{Asn1ConfigFile,none},
 1049:                  asn1ct_partial_decode,Error}]} ->
 1050:             {error,Error};
 1051:         Other ->
 1052:             Other
 1053:     end.
